Description.Text: On the beachfront just outside Marbella, this large hotel complex has seasonal indoor and outdoor pools. Relax in the rooms that are like small houses, comfortable, independent and completely equipped for your rest. The Hotel disposes of a Buffet restaurant, shaped like a half moon, with sea views and to a marvellous theme pool with water slides and a great solarium with deck chairs and palms. Located at la Costa del Golf (the Golf Coast), it offers numerous Golf Courses in the surroundings. The nearest Golf Courses are 2 kms away from the Hotel "Los Naranjos" and "Santa Clara Golf". The Hotel is very close to Marbella, Puerto Banus and Fuengirola and offers its customers a courtesy bus (free of charge) to the centre of Marbella. The Hotel has an outdoor theme swimming pool, with water slides and whirlpool (access only for those more than 16 years). Kids swimming pool, Solarium with Palms. Indoor heated swimming pool (closed during summer season). For the smallest ones the Mini-Club Delfn Playa ( from 4 to 12 years, it is not a nursery school) . Wide activity program in charge of our entertainers. Playing areas for petanque, enormous chess, shuffle-board, archery, carabine, mini-golf and ping-pong . Gym and browsing room Night and day entertainment programs, adapted to our different customers' ages. A weekly activity program is exposed on the activity panel for any consultation you wish to make at any moment. The usage of the pool towels and pool deck chairs is free of charge. To use the towels a deposit is required, which will be charged to your room and will be credited at the end of your stay. The deck chairs cannot the booked. The Parking lot is private (against payment, places are limited and cannot be booked). Nanny service is on request (the price can vary, depending on the timetable). Cradles are Free (on request, and subject to the hotel availability). You can also rent prams, these are subject to the hotel availability.

The Marbella Playa Hotel is located in a privilege area, belonging to the region of West Malaga. Marbella offers a special microclimate with soft temperatures during the whole year, due to its geographic location and the surrounding mountain ranges. The annual average temperature is 19 C and the sun shines 320 days per year, with less than 50 rainy days. Marbella has 27 Km. of beach, 12 Km of which are blue areas that are growing in the course of time. Marbella is by nature blue and green, the ecological maintenance support is obvious in its many hectare of pine groves, which are mainly plant in 4 areas: Elviria, Puente Pala , Los Pinares and Lago de Las Tortugas. Among the first-rate receptive infrastructures, its three harbours : Puerto Bans , Yachting Harbour of Marbella and Puerto Cabopino stand out, as well as its boundless variety of sports facilities, in which are included a great number of equipped golf courses.

Standard Room - Most of the rooms are located in the small bungalow-houses of Andalusien style, surrounded by green areas. Depending on the type , they dispose of 2 beds of 1,35x2m or 1 bed of 1,80x2m with a sofa bed, or 2 beds of 1,05x2m. The first child, till the age of 14 years, goes FREE, sharing a single room with one adult or sharing a double/twin room with two adults, sharing the available beds (no extra bed can be set up) . The second child till the age of 14 years, with discounts, sharing a double room with 2 adults and the available beds . No extra beds can be set up. The rooms dispose of satellite TV with more than 15 channels, telephone, mini-bar (against payment), safe (against payment), Airconditioning or heating depending on the season, ceiling fan and reinforced door, bathroom with hairdryer. Balcony/terrace.
